articles.author: Rajan Menon
articles.title: Washington's NATO summit won't have good news for Ukraine - MSNBC
articles.description: Ukraine entering NATO soon isn't in the U.S.'s best interests and the success of far-right parties in Europe doesn't bode well for its imminent entry either.
articles.content: On the eve of NATOs Washington summit, which runs Tuesday to Thursday and marks the alliances 75th anniversary, American foreign policy mavens identified with the realist school of thought signed an … [+5688 chars]
